0.0.1.name: wordpress/rally-pledge-button
0.0.1.description:
Provides a button in post editor for adding a shortcode that links to a rally on rally.org

Use it

A shortcode is available to be used in your posts or pages :

  • [rally-pledge page="http://rally.org/buzkashiboys"] --> embed the cover page widget block for http://rally.org/buzkashiboys

Contributors

Contributors are listed here

(Contributors to original source plugins wp-bitbucket and custom-tinymce-shortcode-button) * grosbuff * nrowe

Notes

For feature request and bug reports, please use the forums.

If you are a plugin developer,
